issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description

When building for ws-local and using a windows specific app id the CLI will error with  the below

{code: title=app does not already exist}

h5.Steps to reproduce

# Add the following to the windows section of your tiapp (creating if it doesnt exist) {{<id>com.incrediblyuniqueappid</id>}}
# Build the app using {{appc run -p windows -T ws-local}} (windows local from Studio)

h5.Actual

It will error out with the above error

h5.Expected

It should not error out
fields.summary: Windows: CLI errors when using a Windows specific app id and building for ws-local

comments.body:
Verified fix in SDK Version 7.0.0.v20170815065413 and SDK Version: 6.2.0.v20170815130745

Test and other information can be found at:
https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile_windows/pull/1034
